cards.title: 15 things you never realized until you became a happy parent
C’mon, Mom and Dad, you don’t need to sleep, do you?
cards.content: 1. Be careful when using that expression, ’to sleep like a baby’. Sometimes it seems like newborns try to prove that they can go without sleep for days!
2. After you’ve had a baby, you’ll learn that good sleep is way cooler than sex.
3. Leave them for a couple of minutes on their own, and your apartment will never be the same again
4. It’s really not that big a deal if you lose your cell phone, or even all of your money...You know nothing about loss...and by the way, have you ever lost a pacifier?

cards.title: What do you want from us?! We’ve been trying to put her to sleep for hours!
cards.content: 5. Sweet friendly people suddenly turn into ready-to-kill monsters when someone is knocking on the door while their angel is having a nap.
6. Did you once believe that a landing on Mars would be huge for the whole of humanity? Oh, please. From now on the most anticipated event for you and your universe is this little guy’s first step.

cards.title: I’m a trained professional!
cards.content: 7. You know every single thing about diapers. Actually, you could even give lectures or teach a class on how to choose and change diapers with superhuman speed.

cards.title: They are everywhere! We couldn’t possibly have bought all of these! ...Or did we?
cards.content: 8. You know every single thing about diapers. Actually, you could even give lectures or teach a class on how to choose and change diapers with superhuman speed.
9. You’ll give them literally everything in order to stop them crying.

cards.title: I’ll need some diapers, baby food, water, juice, napkins, toys...What!? The store has already closed?
cards.content: 10. Even if you’re planning a 30-minute walk, you’ll end up packing numerous bags full of baby stuff.
11. In just a year and a half your 6 lbs. of love will become 24 lbs. of happiness.

cards.title: So you’ll have to forget some bad words and work on your vocabulary and behavior in general.
cards.content: 12. They copy everything you do or say. Literally, EVERYTHING!
13. Consider yourself an educated adult and broad-minded person? Yeah, wait until your kid asks you questions that will make you scratch your head.
14. Funny videos of babies used to just make you smile, but now videos like this make you go ’Aww!’ and hit the replay several times.

cards.title: Mom, get me some milk, please!’
cards.content: 15. Your child soon becomes the boss of the house and you live according to his or her schedule.
